content.text: Hi, my name is Emma. I'm 27 years old. I'm a software engineer. I have a boyfriend who lives in Italy. I have long hair and my mom lives with me. I love video games and I hate cooking.

Hi Emma, my name is Ben. I'm 32 years old. I'm a graphic designer. I'm single and I love watching superhero shows. I have two monitors for work and I prefer iPhones over Samsungs. I read ebooks more than hardcopies.
Nice to meet you, Ben. What are some of your favorite superhero shows?
I love all of the Marvel shows on Disney+. I also like The Flash and Arrow on CW.
Me too! I love the Marvel shows. I'm looking forward to the new season of Hawkeye.
I am too! I'm also excited for the new season of Loki.
Those shows are so good. I'm glad they're renewed for more seasons.
Me too. I'm always excited for new episodes of my favorite shows.
What do you like to do for fun besides watch TV?
I like to read, play video games, and go for walks.
I love reading too! What are some of your favorite books?
I love the Harry Potter series, the Hunger Games series, and the Percy Jackson series.
Me too! I love all of those series.
They're so good. I'm always excited for new books in the series.
Me too. I'm glad we have similar interests.
Me too. It's always nice to meet someone who likes the same things you do.
